title: Love Island's Amber Gill caught on camera looking worse for wear at boozy launch party
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest Daily Love Island stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Love Island star Amber Gill has been caught on camera looking worse for wear as she drunk danced at her MissPap launch party.

The 2019 winner was guest of honour at the lavish bash, which was attended by co-stars including Molly-Mae Hague and Amy Hart.

Amber, 22, made sure all eyes were on her by donning a long wavy wig for the bash, and it looked like she had a cracking time.

Video filmed later in the night, shows Amber dancing with friends looking all partied out.

Her eyes kept closing and her jaw flapped as she made faces and sang at the camera.

Amber's friends later posted a picture of the reality star tucked up in bed after a long night.

(Image: wavymusicofficial/Instagram)

(Image: wavymusicofficial/Instagram)

During the evening, Amber posted a massive thank you to her friends, co-stars and collaborators for helping support her MissPap project.

In a post on Insatgram, she wrote: "Y’all really thought I was missing the opportunity to launch on 10/10... THANK YOU...

"To everyone that came through to my launch party & shopped my @misspap collection.

"To everybody supporting me I had an amazing night it really was a VIBE and I hope you all did too..."

(Image: wavymusicofficial/Instagram)

(Image: SplashNews.com)

Many of Amber's villa pals turned out to support her on her big night, including Anna Vakili and Yewande Biala.

Molly-Mae Hague even turned out with boyfriend Tommy Fury, putting to bed rumours of a feud between her and her co-stars.

Molly-Mae caused a stir earlier this week after appearing to snub Anna Vakili's shoe launch.

(Image: SplashNews.com)

Anna had invited Molly to party with her sister Mandi and their former reality TV stars but the blonde beauty raised eyebrows by failing to attend.

But Anna later insisted there was no bad blood between them saying: "There is no feud we are friends. Fake news all the time."

description: Love Island winner Amber Gill was out celebrating her MissPap partnership at a glitzy bash in London last night
